body: So, every once in a while on Avicus, I get kicked for something that I did like a month ago? And it never stops, anyone know what this is? Is it meant to happen, is it a bug? I need help!1!!!!1!!!11
body_tagged: So, every once in a while on Avicus, I get kicked for something that I did like a month ago? And it never stops, anyone know what this is? Is it meant to happen, is it a bug? I need help!1!!!!1!!!11
title: Help!!!!1!!11!1!!1!11

replies.body: <u></u>Yeah it's a bug. I don't know how to help you though, sorry.
replies.body_tagged: <u></u>Yeah it's a bug. I don't know how to help you though, sorry.

replies.body: I ned a mooood pls xD

replies.body: Yep, it's a bug and the Devs know about this, also it doesn't show on your infraction page hundreds of times, just once.
replies.body_tagged: Yep, it's a bug and the Devs know about this, also it doesn't show on your infraction page hundreds of times, just once.

replies.body: It console it gives you your old kicks and warning, however it doesnt run though bans thought tempbans I believe someone told me :)!
replies.body_tagged: It console it gives you your old kicks and warning, however it doesnt run though bans thought tempbans I believe someone told me :)!

replies.body: No, it does ban you again. It's happened to me. Although, you don't need to get it appealed, you can just rejoin.
